meanings.definition: The act of specializing to an excessive degree.
meanings.sent1: Overspecialization can limit one's ability to adapt to new situations.
meanings.sent2: His overspecialization in one area made it difficult for him to explore other fields.
meanings.sent3: The overspecialization of the chef in making only one dish led to a boring menu.
meanings.sent4: Her overspecialization in math was like a narrow tunnel, blocking out the beauty of other subjects.
meanings.sent5: The overspecialization of the mechanic in fixing only one type of car left him clueless when faced with a different model.

meanings.definition: The state of being overly specialized.
meanings.sent1: Overspecialization can lead to a lack of versatility in skills.
meanings.sent2: The overspecialization of the team in one strategy made them vulnerable to unexpected changes.
meanings.sent3: The overspecialization of the cat in catching mice left it clueless when faced with a bird.
meanings.sent4: His overspecialization in gardening was like being stuck in a small garden with no room to grow.
meanings.sent5: The overspecialization of the artist in one style limited their creativity and innovation.
